Description:
  NPE is thrown out when preview a report containing a hidden chart 

Test Date:
20071206

Test Build:
BIRT2.3.0 DailyBuild: v20071206-1112

Step to reproduce:

1. Use the report attached
2. Preview it

An engine bug due to last getSize() (Bug 209599) check-in.

Error log:
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at

        at
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedContentVisitor.visitForeign(LocalizedContentVisitor.java:438)
        at

        at
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.LocalizedContentVisitor.localize(LocalizedContentVisitor.java:146)
